# Changelog - Sindri v2

All notable changes to Sindri v2 (Bash/Docker) will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

<!-- Entries below are auto-generated by release workflow -->

## [2.5.0] - 2026-02-01

### :sparkles: Features

- feat: v3 pre-release stabilization efforts (#50) (10b284d)
- feat(v3): production-ready v3 architecture with 90% faster builds (592686c)
- feat(v3): Implement Sindri v3 architecture with dual-version support (0abee17)

### :bug: Bug Fixes

- fix(security): resolve SSH private keys and GitHub CLI CVE vulnerabilities (439cfbc)

### Installation

```bash
# Pull Docker image
docker pull ghcr.io/pacphi/sindri:v2.5.0

# Or use specific tag
docker pull ghcr.io/pacphi/sindri:v2

# Run container
docker run -it -v sindri-home:/alt/home/developer ghcr.io/pacphi/sindri:v2.5.0
```




## [2.2.1] - 2026-01-21

### :bug: Bug Fixes

- fix: correct lexer parsing issue for new-project invocations when in interactive mode (fa31528)

### :wrench: Maintenance

- chore(release): update CHANGELOG.md and VERSION for v2.2.0 (efc6bc9)

### Installation

```bash
# Clone and checkout
git clone https://github.com/pacphi/sindri.git
cd sindri
git checkout v2.2.1

# Deploy (choose your provider)
./v2/cli/sindri deploy --provider docker   # Local Docker
./v2/cli/sindri deploy --provider fly      # Fly.io
./v2/cli/sindri deploy --provider devpod   # DevContainer
```

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pacphi/sindri/compare/v2.2.0...v2.2.1

## [2.2.0] - 2026-01-19

### :sparkles: Features

- feat: add 3 new extensions - claude-codepro, agent-browser, pal-mcp-server (#26) (e516a94)

### :wrench: Maintenance

- chore(release): update CHANGELOG.md and VERSION for v2.1.0 (0904edb)

### Installation

```bash
# Clone and checkout
git clone https://github.com/pacphi/sindri.git
cd sindri
git checkout v2.2.0

# Deploy (choose your provider)
./v2/cli/sindri deploy --provider docker   # Local Docker
./v2/cli/sindri deploy --provider fly      # Fly.io
./v2/cli/sindri deploy --provider devpod   # DevContainer
```

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pacphi/sindri/compare/v2.1.0...v2.2.0

## [2.1.0] - 2026-01-18

### :sparkles: Features

- feat: add extension conflict resolution and priority-based initialization (1269c14)

### :bug: Bug Fixes

- fix: preserve files before extension init for merge (8b65b79)
- fix: correct validation patterns and remove non-existent agentic-flow checks (ca8e050)

### :books: Documentation

- docs: release notes should mention version in filename (44f0da7)

### :wrench: Maintenance

- chore(release): update CHANGELOG.md and VERSION for v2.0.0 (a1eba47)

### Installation

```bash
# Clone and checkout
git clone https://github.com/pacphi/sindri.git
```

## [2.0.0] - 2026-01-16

### :sparkles: Features

- feat: add custom extensions support and enhance extension capabilities (83a1a6a)
- feat: extensions are now responsible for adding project management capabilities (#25) (7208c80)
- feat: migrate to pnpm package manager for npm: backend (41adf48)
- feat: enhance Fly.io reliability, NPM auth, and extension updates (f4901b4)

### :bug: Bug Fixes

- fix: correct ralph extension category from dev-tools to ai (227ec15)
- fix: change rust extension BOM source from rustup to script (96734e6)
- fix: shorten claude-flow-v3 command line to meet YAML lint limit (ed1de0f)
- fix: shorten agentic-qe description to meet 200 char limit (b74e997)
- fix: resolve installation failures for three extensions (baaac1e)
- fix: resolve markdown linting errors in prd-to-docs command (b21846c)
- fix: add missing template cleanup paths and Claude Code commands (8ecd7ad)
- fix: pin npm package versions and add failure cleanup (f97619a)

### :books: Documentation

- docs: update FAQ SPA (5462961)
- docs: add comprehensive 2.0.0 release notes (43e2a0b)
- docs: format markdown tables in prd-to-docs command (c7e8bd8)

### :recycle: Refactoring

- refactor: optimize Docker image size and improve extension reliability (01b02a7)

### :wrench: Maintenance

- chore: track .env.example for environment setup (6fbba10)
- chore(release): update CHANGELOG.md and VERSION for v1.13.0 (b11ec4d)

### Installation

```bash
# Clone and checkout
git clone https://github.com/pacphi/sindri.git
cd sindri
git checkout v2.0.0

# Deploy (choose your provider)
./v2/cli/sindri deploy --provider docker   # Local Docker
./v2/cli/sindri deploy --provider fly      # Fly.io
./v2/cli/sindri deploy --provider devpod   # DevContainer
```

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pacphi/sindri/compare/v1.13.0...v2.0.0
